title: A player returns from a 3 year hiatus to evaluate league
body:
After 3 years of sporadically playing league every couple of months at a friends house or just not at all, I came back to league full time to do my placement matches.

naturally I was rusty and could only really play maybe 3 champions in each role, however I did go 8 for 6, until my last game,
 i didn't feel I needed to make a post, but honestly, the community in general so far, has been atrocious.
 more than 50% of my losses have been accountable to someone deliberately throwing the game in a fit of rage, or having to 4 v 5 because someone didn't have time to play. after my last game, with two particularly well behaved bronze five gents who deliberately fed 16 kills each spamming laughter in the chat box and tickling themselves pink,
the TLDR summary of my league experience has been as follows.

Everything is the same
except for player behavior - if anything it's twice as bad as it was during the earlier stages of the game.
some skins are nice - albeit very expensive, I won't really see myself investing in 15 dollars for a skin I really like (which are only usually good, on top tier champs which are often played and picked all the time so you may get to actually use it once every five or six games)
if i spent 200 dollars on skins, I'd be like to have 20 quality skins,

if I spent 200 dollars on humble bundle, I'd have half a terabyte of new games to play.

Obviously this post is probably TL;DR or extremely unpopular opinion/Cheeky downvote material.

But I won't stop playing league, I do like the games, I mean the good ones, the one in every 4 where the whole team is willing to cooperate and speak to each other, no one has to "brb mum" and we win by a fraction of an inch, those are the games I live for, and League can occasionally provide that for me, it's just the other 90% of the time that is the issue, I've decided to make this post in the hopes of seeking out players who don't lose there cool/rage quit/ trash talk, so i could play some quality games , with some quality blokes, I can play just about any role, and I'm bronze 1.

hit me up anytime.
